caption.p: Simulated summer water temperature trends for 1950–2015 using the Mann-Kendall test (MKT). Triangle sizes represent the magnitude of the overall monotonic trend (°C (66 yr) −1). Triangles with white dots denote trends significant at p < 0.05 with p-values provided in Supplementary Table S5. Map generated using ESRI ArcMap 10.5.1 ( http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap/).
